title: Implement Persistence Service
description: Persistence service using SQLite. Store sessions, variables, history, user functions. Auto-save every 30s, schema migrations, session cleanup. Schema per DDD-002 Section 7.1. Location: /src/persistence/services/persistence-service.ts Tests: /tests/persistence/integration/persistence.test.ts Tracer: T3

title: Implement Expression Evaluator
description: Expression evaluator for AST traversal. Supports built-in math functions, variables, constants. Pure function with <1ms evaluation target. Location: /src/core/pure/evaluator.ts Tests: /tests/core/unit/evaluator.test.ts Tracer: T1

title: Implement Transport Service
description: Transport service for client-daemon communication. Unix socket, TCP, stdio transports. JSON-RPC 2.0 protocol, connection lifecycle management, request-response with timeouts. Location: /src/transport/services/transport-service.ts Tests: /tests/transport/integration/transport.test.ts Tracer: T3

title: Implement Core Domain Tokenizer
description: Tokenizer for the expression evaluation core domain. Handles NUMBER, IDENTIFIER, OPERATOR, LPAREN, RPAREN, COMMA, EOF tokens. Tracks source position for error reporting. Location: /src/core/pure/tokenizer.ts Tests: /tests/core/unit/tokenizer.test.ts Tracer: T1

title: Implement Session Management
description: Session management for daemon. Create isolated sessions per client, lifecycle management (active, suspended, terminated), 30min timeout, cleanup expired sessions. Location: /src/daemon/session-manager.ts Tests: /tests/daemon/session-manager.test.ts Tracer: T3

title: Implement JSON-RPC Protocol Handler
description: JSON-RPC 2.0 protocol handler for daemon. Methods: eval, eval_batch, set_var, get_var, get_vars, clear_vars, get_history, define_func, get_funcs, ping. Error codes per JSON-RPC spec. Location: /src/daemon/rpc-server.ts Tests: /tests/daemon/rpc-server.test.ts Tracer: T3

title: Implement TUI with Ink
description: Terminal User Interface using Ink 5.x and React. Components: App, InputPanel, ResultsPanel, HistorySidebar. Syntax highlighting, history navigation, daemon connection. Location: /src/tui/ Tests: /tests/tui/components/App.test.tsx Tracer: T2 Reference: ADR-004

title: Implement Pratt Parser
description: Pratt Parser for AST generation. Supports binary operators (+, -, *, /, %, ^), unary operators (+, -), function calls. Respects precedence levels per ADR-002. Location: /src/core/pure/pratt-parser.ts Tests: /tests/core/unit/pratt-parser.test.ts Tracer: T1

title: Implement Operator and Function Registry
description: Registry service for operators, functions, and constants. Precedence levels: comparison(20), additive(30), multiplicative(40), exponentiation(50), unary(60). Location: /src/core/services/registry-service.ts Tests: /tests/core/unit/registry-service.test.ts Tracer: T1

title: Implement Self-Learning Hooks System
description: Self-learning hooks per ADR-006. Hooks: session-start (load patterns), pre-eval (cache check), post-eval (store patterns), session-end (persist). Claude-Flow memory integration, privacy controls. Location: /src/hooks/ Tests: /tests/hooks/hooks.test.ts Tracer: T4 Reference: ADR-006

title: Implement CLI Client
description: Command-line interface client. Commands: eval, daemon start/stop/status, config. Supports one-off mode, interactive REPL, JSON output. Exit codes for different error types. Location: /src/cli/ Tests: /tests/cli/commands.test.ts Tracer: T1, T3
